about text:
GoCast Talk
Voice Messaging

Features:
• Easily sends voice messages to a specific contact or group.
• Automatically transcribes your recording so recipients can either read or hear your message.
• Enables replies to messages with recordings and transcriptions.
• Integrates with e-mail for recipients on other devices.

Notes:
• Supports voice messages up to ten minutes.
• Transcribes the first minute of the recorded message.
• Allows 20 free transcriptions per day.

Voice recognition technology by Nuance Communications, Inc.
Transcription not available:
(No text)

Automatic transcription is available up to 20 times per day during the free service period.
voice email post:
"

Sent via GoCast Talk. Check us out at: http://gocast.it/talk/.

 When you register for a user account, you will be able to exchange voice messages with your business colleagues.
voice email pre:
I'm sending you a voice message via GoCast Talk.

If you want to play it, please click on the attached audio file.

Automatic transcription as follows:
"
welcome message:
Welcome to GoCast Talk.

GoCast Talk is an easy reliable voice messaging service.

Press the record button to create a message.

After you record the message a transcription is available immediately.

You can easily address a voice message to a specific contact or group.

Replies are just as easy.

Press the "reply" button below to record a voice message, and try to send it.

If you reply to this message the GoCast team will receive it.

Please let us know what you think!

--GoCast Team
